job_tasks.phrase: Train, fine-tune, and benchmark state-of-the-art ML models, leveraging recent advancements in deep learning.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of training, fine-tuning, and evaluating machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and optimize Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions, leveraging prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to enhance language processing capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions developing LLM solutions using techniques like prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and RAG, which are all core modeling activities within GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and automation of data pipelines for various ML/GenAI tasks like evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Engineer and extract meaningful features from structured and unstructured language data to improve model accuracy and robustness.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the process of feature engineering from data, which is a key part of data preparation for ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into our platforms and services.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the integration of developed ML solutions into existing products and services, a common software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research, identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates understanding the broader AI landscape and identifying opportunities for product improvement, linking technical advancements to business value.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research
identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes development and optimization of LLM-based solutions using advanced techniques like RAG and fine-tuning. It also mentions prompt engineering and integrating these solutions into products, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
